relevant_findings.cardiovascular: RRR, normal s1, s2, No M/G/R
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Clear to auscultation b/l, No W/R/R
relevant_findings.abdomen: Soft, mildly distended, moderately tender along epigastrium and RUQ, no rebound or guarding, normoactive bowel sounds
relevant_findings.extremities: No edema, warm and well perfused

ultrasound.liver: Echogenicity of the liver is normal; no focal hepatic lesions
ultrasound.biliary_dilatation: Moderate intrahepatic biliary dilatation; extrahepatic ducts dilated with mid common bile duct measuring up to 1.4 cm
ultrasound.gallbladder: Multiple shadowing gallstones; moderate wall edema and thickening; slightly distended
ultrasound.hydronephrosis: Mild right-sided hydronephrosis; urinary bladder significantly dilated

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Intra- and extra-hepatic biliary dilatation is new since previous assessment.
